refbody.section: Motivation Sometimes it is useful to see the values of system properties which were available to the application.

strow.stentry: No arguments are supplied to this query

section.title: Result
section.p: A table with three columns, one the Java collection holding the properties, then the key and value. The key and value are Java Strings, so the resolved value is shown. The collection, key and value items are all Java objects, and the investigation can be continued by using the context menu to select a further query to run on the item.
